page.title: 12A FAMILY INDUSTRY
page.content: My dad is called Roy. My dad and his brother,who is called Roland own this firm where they hire out skips.They take a skip to a house or an industry.The people fill it up with rubbish or scrap,then we come and take the skip to empty it. Then they go and empty it. A skip is like a big box that goes on the back of the lorry.At the yard we have a yardsman who sells sand,gravel,cement,blocks and bricks. Sometimes people want scrap so we use a digger or a drote. A digger is a machine with wheels and a bucket. A drote is a machine that has got tracks and a bucket. To load cement,blocks and bricks we use a fork-lift-truck a fork-lift-truck is a machine with forks on the front. And that is what my dad does for R&R Melland. by Carl Melland.
